item.title: Archetype Plugin - Apache Maven Tutorial â€“ CodeTab
item.description: Maven Archetype Plugin In the previous tutorial, we covered Maven Resources Plugin. In this tutorial, we introduce Maven Archetype Plugin. An archetype is a template for a Maven project which is used by the Maven Archetype plugin to create new projects. Simply put, it generates skeleton for different types of projects. To better understand, lets create a new project using Maven Archetype Plugin. $ mvn archetype:generate -DgroupId=com.xyz -DartifactId=my-app -Dversion=1.0 -DpackageName=com.
